replies.msg:
大家好 小弟係澳洲 budget大約 3000澳元以下 可能同香港價格 有d出入 但想大家比下意見我條list! 價格可以改下! 希望買到部機可以用到5-6年

https://au.pcpartpicker.com/list/sr9FbX

CPU: Intel - Core i7-8700K 3.7GHz 6-Core Processor ($518.00 @ Shopping Express)
CPU Cooler: Cooler Master - MasterLiquid ML240L RGB 66.7 CFM Liquid CPU Cooler ($89.00 @ PCCaseGear)
Motherboard: ASRock - Z370 Extreme4 ATX LGA1151 Motherboard ($219.00 @ Scorptec)
Memory: G.Skill - Ripjaws V Series 16GB (2 x 8GB) DDR4-3000 Memory ($229.00 @ Mwave Australia)
Storage: Samsung - 970 Evo 500GB M.2-2280 Solid State Drive ($275.00 @ Centre Com)
Storage: Western Digital - Caviar Blue 1TB 3.5" 7200RPM Internal Hard Drive ($54.50 @ Shopping Express)
Video Card: EVGA - GeForce GTX 1080 Ti 11GB SC Black Edition Video Card ($996.71 @ Amazon Australia)
Case: Fractal Design - Meshify C Dark TG ATX Mid Tower Case ($135.00 @ PLE Computers)
Power Supply: EVGA - SuperNOVA G2 650W 80+ Gold Certified Fully-Modular ATX Power Supply ($145.00 @ Amazon Australia)
Total: $2661.21

我諗緊 cpu cooler 可唔可以改下 想大家比下意見!

希望用番8700K同1080TI - 定係應該等新CPU同GPU出先換機會抵屌D

replies.msg:
Would recommend to wait for new CPU/GPU.

Just some savings:
Samsung - 970 Evo 500GB -> Samsung - 960 Evo 500GB
https://www.ebay.com.au/itm/Samsung-960-EVO-500GB-M-2-NVMe-PCIe3-0-X4-Internal-Solid-State-Drive-SSD-3-2GB-s/222900657390?epid=2142140943&hash=item33e5ea1cee:g:SsIAAOSw15Vba64o ($207.00 @ Ebay)


Personally suggestion:
Cooler Master - MasterLiquid ML240L -> Noctua NH-U14S CPU Cooler ($105.00 @ PCCaseGear)

ching do you think i should upgrade to the newest cpu and gpu when it is available or wait for these cpu and gpu to pricedrop

replies.msg: For a PC that lasts for 5-6 years just take the latest GPU/CPU. 1180ti might be available at launch.
